data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Mandalay, Myanmar (Burma) to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mandalay, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 56,508 believers in the state of Mandalay with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 20 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 56,508 believers in the state of Mandalay to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who are far from you in Mandalay. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Yaw people.
Father, help the 56,508 believers in Mandalay to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Mandalay
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Mandalay to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
